verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: will] announce today whether the U.S. will leave the Iran nuclear deal , with consequences likely to be felt from Middle East war zones to oil markets . If the U.S. president refuses to keep waiving sanctions under the six - nation accord reached in 2015 , there ’s a chance Iran will also walk away and resume its atomic program . European powers have pressed Trump to preserve the agreement while they negotiate side - deals to address his main concerns . A breakthrough has so far remained elusi

[ARGM-ADV: If the U.S. president refuses to keep waiving sanctions under the six - nation accord reached in 2015 , there ’s a chance Iran will also walk away and resume its atomic program] . European powers have pressed Trump to preserve the agreement while they negotiate side - deals to address his main concerns . A breakthrough has so far remained elusi

If the U.S. president refuses to keep waiving sanctions under the six - nation accord reached in 2015 , there ’s a chance Iran will also walk away and resume its atomic program . European powers have pressed Trump to preserve the agreement while they negotiate side - deals to address his main concerns . A breakthrough has so far remained elusi
